name: Sandwich Clicker
description: Sandwich Clicker is a Single Player Clicker Game where you buy ingredients to increase your click value  until you get enough to get to the next sandwich type.  This is my first time every creating a game and the only reason I'm putting this here so I can show it to people for feedback. Sorry if the game isn't that polished or buggy as like I said its my first time creating a game and I am fairly young for creating a game. Everything in this game was created by me not including the audio or the font. I hope you enjoy my game and if you find a bug please report it by commenting it below. Also sorry that it was only full-screen I had an error with the UI not scaling to the screen so I had to use full-screen.
